LEADERS.name: Prabhat Kumar
LEADERS.msg: I warmly welcome you as we begin another promising year of dedication and service. Together, we will build an inclusive and innovative environment where every student voice matters.

LEADERS.name: Pratul Kumar
LEADERS.msg: As Vice President, I am committed to inspiring innovation and encouraging leadership across all student initiatives. Let's make our council a true pillar of growth.

LEADERS.name: Vedant Singh
LEADERS.msg: As Secretary, I am dedicated to maintaining transparency, fostering communication, and ensuring every student's concern is heard and addressed.
